item.title: SEC May Grant Blockchain Industry a Green Light Under “Innovation Exemption”
item.description:
SEC chair Paul Atkins has revealed staff are drafting a conditional exemptive relief scheme—an 'innovation exemption'—to fast-track blockchain products and services. The proposal departs from prior enforcement-led policy and reflects a friendlier stance toward crypto in the United States.

item.description:
